Section.name: About AISSMSCOE
Section.description:
All India Shri Shivaji Memorial Society College of Engineering (AISSMS COE), was established in the year 1992 and is approved by AICTE, Delhi. The institution is founded by Chhatrapati Shri Shahu Maharaj of Kolhapur and is recognized under section 2(f) and 12(B) by UGC. It is recognized by the Government of Maharashtra and affiliated to the Savitribai Phule Pune University (SPPU), Pune. It is the first Institute to be accredited with A+ grade by NAAC (3.27 CGPA) in the first cycle. The College within a short span has established itself as one of the best Engineering Colleges in Maharashtra and also in India.
AISSMS College of Engineering received the “Best Professional College” Award in Urban Category by Savitribai Phule Pune University (SPPU), Pune. AISSMS COE offers BE, ME, Ph.D. courses to students applying at the college, admission to which is both merit and entrance based. The cut-off for BE admissions ranges between 95-106. In addition to this, the placement cell of the institute is growing every year. The majority of students placed in the years 2017, 2018, and 2019 are 301, 310, and 325 respectively. The major recruiters of the college are Godrej, IBM, TATA Consultancy Services, L’Oreal, Castrol, ICICI Bank, etc.
Read More: AISSMS College of Engineering Cut-off
Table of Content
All India Shri Shivaji Memorial Society College of Engineering (AISSMS) offers various courses in the streams of Engineering. Given below are the intake capacity of both Undergraduate (BE) and Postgraduate (ME) courses:

The admission to AISSMS College of Engineering is both online as well as offline. Applicants can download the application form online and submit it upon completion at the college office to complete the application process.
Applicants are selected entirely based on merit in the qualifying examination and their performance in the entrance examination. The college offers seat reservation for applicants belonging to OBC/ SC/ ST/ NT/ VJ/ SBC/ J&K.
Read More: AISSMS College of Engineering Admission
All India Shri Shivaji Memorial Society College of Engineering (AISSMS) assists its students to get placed in major companies. It has over 300 placement recruitment drive every year.
Library
The Library has 35928 print books and 15195 Ebooks. Total 91 National level print journals and 1016 international e-journals are subscribed from various databases like Science Direct, IEEE, ASME, ASCE and McGraw-Hill.

Ques. How are the placements of All India Shri Shivaji Memorial College?
Ans. The placement rate of AISSMS is increasing year by year. The highest package is offered at INR 8 LPA and the average package is offered at INR 4.5 LPA. The previous three-year records of the college shows an increment in the no. of students placed:
Students are given Pre- Placement training to improve their skills in Aptitude tests, English communication, Group discussion, and Personal interviews. The training package has been developed in coordination with industry experts for imparting English communication skills. Some of the experts from various industries are called for soft skills training for BE batch. Experts from various industries are invited to deliver Seminars on higher studies and career guidance for students.
Read More: AISSMS College of Engineering Placement
Ques. Are sandwich courses good?
Ans. Mechanical and Production Sandwich Courses of All India Shri Shivaji Memorial provide an opportunity for students to interact with industry professionals and conduct training in reputed companies like TATA Motors, Thermax, SKF Bearing, JCB, John Deere, Volkswagen, etc. The training period starts in the second semester of 3rd-year and the first semester of the final year. The duration of each training period is 6 months.
Sandwich courses of 4-year duration also include one-year inplant training and the degree is awarded by the Savitribai Phule Pune University.
Ques. Who to contact for placement-related queries?
Ans. Dr. A. V. Waghmare is the head of the training and placement department. Students may contact him via mail or phone. Given below are the details for the same:
